pl.mazurmarcin.webcalculator.utils

Interface CurrencyUtils

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CurrencyUtilsImpl

    public interface CurrencyUtils
    Interface used to download JSON Array with currencies from NBP.PL and transform it into the List of Currency objects.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Currency> getCurrencyList(String selectedCurrencyCode)
      Returns the list of the Currency for given currency code

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrencyList

        List<Currency> getCurrencyList(String selectedCurrencyCode)
                        throws org.json.JSONException,
                               IOException
        Returns the list of the Currency for given currency code
        Parameters:
        selectedCurrencyCode - The String containing the code of the currency
        Returns:
        A The List<Currency> representing the list of currencies
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - A JSONException is thrown when the JSONObject is not able to return requested value
        IOException - A IOException is thrown then the JSONArray is not able to be download
